state.code:
%% Exercise 0.6: New Note Page in SPA Diagram
sequenceDiagram
actor User
    User->>+Browser: Clicks 'Submit' buttom
    Browser->>+Server: Sends User's input as JSON to server
    Note left of Browser: Adds input to notes
    Browser->>User: Renders new list of notes
    Browser->>Server: Sends User's input to server as JSON
    Note right of Browser: POST request
    Note left of server: Saves input to data
    Server->>Browser: Sends response to Browser
    Note left of Server: 201 status code response displayed
